abstract: News Corp.’s chairman, Rupert Murdoch, said in an interview with TheStreet.com that he remains committed to MySpace, the social networking site, and isn’t interested in buying The New York Times Co.
snippet: News Corp.’s chairman, Rupert Murdoch, said in an interview with TheStreet.com that he remains committed to MySpace, the social networking site, and isn’t interested in buying The New York Times Co.
lead_paragraph: It’s been four years since Rupert Murdoch surprised the media world with his MySpace acquisition, and two years since he did it again with Dow Jones and The Wall Street Journal.

headline.main: Murdoch Says He’s Committed to MySpace
